meta.description: I would like advice/ wisdom/guidance for how to make my own decision about whether to take it or not. no biased or political answers please.

title: should I get a fourth vaccine?
cleaned_text:
Actually, the new booster reduces illness by 50% in people under 50.

That is a pretty good reason to get boosted.

4000+ people died of Covid in the US last week. Don't fool yourself that Covid is over. Be careful with all the anti-mainstrean crap news out there. Could kill ya.
